0.name: Pedro1
0.text:
It's been 3 weeks since I was sent to the quarry.
My life in Filtra was nice, peaceful. My job was simple but it payed well.
Now I find myself in this shithole.. Doomed to work until my back snaps in two.
Doomed to never see my wife and child ever again. I don't even know if they're alive.
But I know who took them. I know the name of the man who burst into our home and ripped our family apart.
The man who gave the order. The man who beat me into submission.
The invastion of Filitrios left a scar on my mind. That scar has a name.
Jareck Hill.
I will come for you.

1.name: Pedro2
1.text:
This facility isn't big. It's composed of two sections. The work area and the guards office above.
The work area has 4 sleeping chambers, 6 beds in each if they're all like mine.
All connected to one long hallway leading down to the mine past the cafeteria.
On the other end are the stairs to the guard office.
Which I know has at leat an armory and a control room.
I've noticed a pattern where they sent a different guard to check on us every day.
Reminding us that we'll be left for the vultures if we don't comply.
So far I've counted 7 faces. They're armed with automatic weapons each time. But we only need to get the jump on one.
One weapon, 24 men against 6.. I like these odds.

2.name: Pedro3
2.text:
The plan worked. We lost good men but we took control over the facility.
In the control room I gained access to the ships which we are now loading up to make our escape.
It appears as though the guards called in an emergency.
I expect more of them to come soon.
I'll shoot a couple pipes on my way out in hopes that some of them suffocate in the leaking gas.
But more importantly. I went searching. And I found.
Jareck Hill was here 6 days ago. The log I read indicates that he now finds himself in another facility.
The flight route was set to 842 Core. I expect to find him there. With a proper disguise.

Perhaps I can sneak in.. I must try.

3.name: Dreck
3.text:
------------------
Crew: 14
Origin: Trite
Destination: Dreck
------------------
Mission Details
------------------
Workers are rebelling, 22 men are present and armed. 9 have already been taken care of by the local guards. They're about to reach the control room. Triton lives have been lost.
------------------
Terminate the rebelling forces and await further instructions.
------------------
